attributes.additional_details:
Over the years I have observed the local community and there reaction to the gay community.
Many gay people "come out" when they have the support from close friends or others who have been through the same thing.
Northallerton is lacking a LGBT community. Many scared to confront the public about their sexuality!
At the end of the day we are all equal and all human beings!
Sign this petition now for a LGBT youth group to start and support the gay community.
BE GAY AND PROUD!
YOU ARE WHO YOU ARE!
Please support our campaign! No matter gay straight or bi!
So much could be achievable with a LGBT group!
Thanks for your time!
